END AS user_status, CASE WHEN memb.user_level <= 90 THEN '일반회원' ELSE '관리자' END AS user_level, memb.user_profile, memb.user_num, memb.user_id, memb.user_tel, memb.user_name, TO_CHAR(memb.user_birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS user_birth, TO_CHAR(memb.user_created_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS user_created_date, TO_CHAR(memb.last_login_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS last_login_date, TO_CHAR(memb.user_updated_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS user_updated_date, logininfo.login_count AS login_count, postsinfo.posts_count AS posts_count, replyinfo.replycount AS replycount, likecount.total_like_count FROM member memb, ( SELECT memb2.user_id, NVL(COUNT(*), 0) AS login_count FROM log_login login, member memb2 WHERE login.login_usernum = memb2.user_num GROUP BY memb2.user_id ) logininfo, ( SELECT memb3.user_id, NVL(COUNT(*), 0) AS posts_count FROM POSTS pos, member memb3 WHERE memb3.user_num = pos.user_num GROUP BY memb3.user_id ) postsinfo, ( SELECT memb4.user_id, NVL(COUNT(*), 0) AS replycount FROM comments com, member memb4 WHERE memb4.user_num = com.user_num GROUP BY memb4.user_id ) replyinfo, ( SELECT user_num, COUNT(*) AS total_like_count FROM ( SELECT comment_id AS content_id, user_num FROM comments_likes UNION ALL SELECT post_id AS content_id, user_num FROM likes ) GROUP BY user_num ) likecount WHERE memb.user_id = logininfo.user_id(+) AND memb.user_id = postsinfo.user_id(+) AND memb.user_id = replyinfo.user_id(+) AND memb.user_num = likecount.user_num(+) AND memb.user_id = #{user_id}

SELECT days.dayOfWeek, days.dayName, NVL(n.noticeCount, 0) AS noticeCount, NVL(l.commentCount, 0) AS commentCount FROM ( SELECT '2' AS dayOfWeek, '월' AS dayName, 1 AS sortOrder FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '3' AS dayOfWeek, '화' AS dayName, 2 AS sortOrder FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '4' AS dayOfWeek, '수' AS dayName, 3 AS sortOrder FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '5' AS dayOfWeek, '목' AS dayName, 4 AS sortOrder FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '6' AS dayOfWeek, '금' AS dayName, 5 AS sortOrder FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '7' AS dayOfWeek, '토' AS dayName, 6 AS sortOrder FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '1' AS dayOfWeek, '일' AS dayName, 7 AS sortOrder FROM DUAL ) days LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TO_CHAR(created_date, 'D') AS dayOfWeek, COUNT(*) AS noticeCount FROM posts pos, member memb WHERE pos.user_num = memb.user_num AND created_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') AND memb.user_id = #{user_id} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(created_date, 'D') ) n ON days.dayOfWeek = n.dayOfWeek LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TO_CHAR(created_date, 'D') AS dayOfWeek, COUNT(*) AS commentCount FROM comments WHERE created_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') AND user_id = #{user_id} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(created_date, 'D') ) l ON days.dayOfWeek = l.dayOfWeek
ORDER BY days.sortOrder
